84  template<auto ToUnits>
85  Quantity<ToUnits> to() {
86  // Compile-time check for compatible unit type
87  static_assert(std::is_same_v<decltype(ToUnits), decltype(EnumVal)>, "Error, incompatible units");
88  return Units::Convert<EnumVal, ToUnits>(m_impl.m_value);
89  }

rev::Quantity::m_impl
